  • Method Details

    • setCraftingSize

      public static void setCraftingSize(int width, int height)
      Expand the max width and height allowed in the deserializer. This should be called by modders who add custom crafting tables that are larger than the vanilla 3x3.
      Parameters:
      width - your max recipe width
      height - your max recipe height
